text: Ezɨ ia Kraisɨn adarasi, ezɨ Krais, Godɨn anav.(3:23) 1 Korin 1:12 ko 3:4, Pol kamaghɨn mɨgei, Korinɨn siosɨn itir darazi uari abɨgha, egha marazi ghaze, e Polɨn adarasi, ezɨ marazi ghaze, e Apolosɨn adarasi. Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba da nguazimɨn gumazibar nɨghnɨzibar gɨn zui. Korinɨn siosɨn itir gumazamiziba deravɨra Godɨn nɨghnɨzim gɨfogh, egh kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, Pol bar enanav, ezɨ Apolos bar enanav. Pol ko Apolos ko bizir igharaziba sara, me ingangarir gumazibar mɨn ikɨ, Korinɨn siosɨn akurvagh egh me damutɨ, me guizɨn Kraisɨn adarazir mɨn otivam. Kamaghɨn, God me ginaba. 2 Korin 3:1-9ɨn gan.
